comments.body: For the future (no need to change right now), I think it's a bit cleaner to do `false: java.lang.Boolean`. The compiler figures out the most appropriate way to convert.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@      List[Integer](brokerId, brokerId + 1, brokerId + 2),
      List[Integer](brokerId, brokerId + 1, brokerId + 2),
      List.empty[Integer], List.empty[Integer], Seq.empty[Int], Boolean.box(false)),
    Arguments.of(
      List[Integer](brokerId, brokerId + 1),
